name: Epic knight quest
description:
Epic knight quest is an epic platformer where you are  an knight on a journay and  you have to save a  princess from a castle! 8 levels! super pixel graphics! 

Made by me using unity this is my first game  so please be good and nice  and leave critisizm but dont hate!! If you like the game please comment your feedbacks. I am new begginer so it will be very helpfull.  :D

Control - A D - move

Space - jump

Enjoy !

Make sure to have fun.

I will updates
